description: Unique identifier of the maintenance work order associated with this record.
Code identifying the responsible department/team for the asset or work order; likely a functional area label; confirm with SME.
Department schedule identifier for the preventive maintenance plan or route tied to the asset/work order; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the currently open preventive maintenance work order linked to this asset or schedule.
Timestamp when the most recent work order was created for the asset/schedule. A default like 1900-01-01 likely denotes unknown or not applicable.
Date the last maintenance or preventive service was completed for the asset or schedule.
Indicates whether maintenance/PM is currently due (Y) or not due (N).
User ID that created or added the record.
Timestamp when the record was created or added.
User ID that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
